page.title: 10INDUSTRY
page.content: This area contains a large amount of industrial sites alongside the Severn estuary, called the Chittening Estate. The A403 road goes through the area from the docks at Avonmouth to the M4 and Severn Bridge. Most of the buildings are used for warehouse storage, light engineering and servicing of agriculture and building trades. Sevalco makes carbon black, National Carriers store and distribute parcels and two firms store petrol. On the Severn Road there is a small industrial estate. British Pipeline Agency have premises on both sides of the road in Berwick Lane and British Gas have huge buildings and storage tanks dominating the skyline.I.C.I. chemical works are partly in our area.
